thread.title: Cassandra
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Cassandra

author: Cassandra
title: Cassandra
text:
I have been staying at the Colonial Properties for at least 8 years now.
They have always been polite and helpful with any questions or reservations that me and my family has made. This year I made my reservations on line. Everything was simple to do. Thank you Colonial
Properties for making it such a GREAT PLEASURE to stay at your Resort!!!
